As some of you may have noticed, I've just posted with most of my
remaining chars. That's cause I have more than 16 at the moment, and I
have to follow the regulations stated on the site.

Anyways, the point of this is that the char limits apply TOMORROW! If
you have over 7 chars in a faction, fix that. If you have 0ver 16
chars total when tomorrow gets here, you'll need to post very
frequently.
